Package angularBeans.context

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AngularBeansCDIExtension
    AngularBeans CDI Extension implementation to observe application deployment and components scan
    BeanLocator
    provide a lookup method to obtain an angularBean reference from an external context to the HTTP Session context (useful with realTime methods calls)
    GlobalNGSessionContextsMapHolder
    a global holder for all bean stores (on Holder by sessionID)
    MainHTTPSessionListener  
    NGSessionContextHolder
    bean store for the NGSessionScopeContext
    NGSessionContextHolder.NGSessionScopeInstance<T>
    wrap necessary properties so we can destroy the bean later:
    NGSessionScopeContext  
    SessionMapper
    map a group of sockJS sessions to the current HTTP session.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    NGSessionScoped
    NGSessionScoped is a custom CDI scope an NGSessionScoped Bean is a HTTP session scoped Bean but shared between HTTP session and webSocket session can be an @AngularBean or just a CDI NGSessionScoped component to use (without generating the angularJS service)
